name: Destroy LittleJohn (demo)
description:
LITTLEJOHN IS THE #1 MOST WANTED MAN IN 15TH CENTURY BRITAIN. HE HAS DONE MULTIPLE ROBBERIES, MURDERS, DRUG RUNS, AND IS A THREAT TO BRITAIN AS WE KNOW IT. YOU HAVE BEEN HIRED TO KILL HIM. (SO DO THAT.)

This is a test to see if people like this game. If people play it, I might finish it but i don't have the motivation rn
